analyzed: a moda phaliya tthera a padāna
translated: The Story of the Elder Amodaphali
“The One with Golden Skin, the Awakened One,
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of giving fruit.
How welcome it was for me
I have done what the Awakened One taught.
I have done what the Awakened One taught.”🔽Thus the elder Amodaphali recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā amodaphaliyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Amodaphaliyattherassāpadānaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmai amodaphaliyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽amodaphaliya therassa apadānam aṭṭhama
translated: The story of the elder Amodaphali is the eighth.
